README

Markup

Target LanguageWritten In
HTMLNim

Styles

  • Escape: /\\(?<escape>.)/
  • Code: /<-(?<escape>!?)(?<language>\w+)>\{(?<text>[\s\S]*?)\}/
  • Header: /^!(?<level>[1-6])\{(?<text>[^\n]*?)\}$/m
  • Command: /\/(?<cmd>(?:upp|low)er|cap)(?<arguments>(?:::.+?)+?);/
  • Bold: /\*(?!\s)(?<text>[^*\n]+?)(?<!\s)\*/
  • Italic: /\/(?!\s)(?<text>[^\/\n]+?)(?<!\s)\//
  • Underline: /_(?!\s)(?<text>[^_\n]+?)(?<!\s)_/

Order

  1. Escape -> Placeholder
  2. Code
  3. Header
  4. Command
    • Bold
    • Italic
    • Underline
  6. Placeholder -> Escaped

System

AST, meaning;

  • x nesting
  • overlaping
